flow.header: Follow our universal guide to pair your account with 2FAS app.

menu.title: Please be aware that this is an overall guide.

steps.content: Go to the service and **log into your account**.
Click your avatar or menu icon and search for **settings**.
Go to **security** or **privacy settings** and find a **two-factor authentication** option. Click or enable it.
You may be asked to enter a password for security reasons. Enter your password and click **'Continue'**.

Select the **'Authentication app'** option and scan shown QR code or retype your secret key manually.

Scanning the QR code will generate a token in the 2FAS app. Retype it to finish up the 2FA setting.
